attributes.action: Agree to the three core demands of the Extinction Rebellion protest.
attributes.additional_details:
The three points from the protest are:

1:For the government to tell the truth about   climate change

2: To reduce carbon emissions by 2025

3: To create a citizens assembly to oversee progress

Extinction rebellion website: https://rebellion.earth/
attributes.background: Despite the recent world wide protest to prevent climate change our government hasn’t agreed to any of the points set out by Extinction Rebellion. Therefore we need to show our support for the protests.
